original_text: Their minds have become confused and they argue all the time. They refuse to believe God's true message. They think that they will become rich if they say that they are serving God.
korean_text: 마음이 부패하여지고 진리를 잃어 버려 경건을 이익의 방도로 생각하는 자들의 다툼이 일어나느니라

sentences.original_text: and they argue all the time
They refuse to believe God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 진정한 메시지를 믿기를 거부합니다

sentences.original_text: They think that they will become rich
if they say that they are serving God
